column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " Varrick !
#Text=I 'm busy inspiring my workers .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Well , I went to Zaofu and saved Su and her family ... and guess who else we found ?
#Text=Ha !
#Text=" Varrick says : " Zhu Li .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Now , is n't there something you wanted to say to her ?
#Text=Hmm ?
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " Please , let me go first .
#Text=I know I said a lot of terrible things about you in front of Kuvira .
#Text=But I need you to know ... I did n't mean one word .
#Text=When you were being taken away , I thought my only chance to save you was to join her .
#Text=But every day , I hoped for the chance to see you again and tell you the truth .
#Text=Varrick , you mean the world to me and I 'm sorry if I hurt you in any way .
#Text=" Varrick says : " Do n't be so hard on yourself .
#Text=Apology accepted !
#Text=Now be a good assistant and man the assembly line !
#Text=" Zhu Li says : " No !
#Text=I am not your assistant anymore .
#Text=If you want me around , you need to start treating me like an equal !
#Text=" Radio operator says : " We 're patched into the emergency broadcast line .
#Text=You 're going out to every radio in the city .
#Text=" Mako says : " Attention citizens of Republic City .
#Text=This is not a test .
#Text=An attack on our city is imminent .
#Text=President Raiko has ordered a mandatory evacuation for all citizens .
#Text=Please find your evacuation handbooks and turn to subsection one - dash - two - six .
#Text=There you will find initial instructions for your area .
#Text=For example , if you live in northwest vector one , report to your primary meeting location , which would be at the eastern entrance of the Southern Water Tribe library .
#Text=There , you would choose a leader as specified in section one - dash - two - eight .
#Text=" Radio operator says : " Uh , Chief , we 're getting confused calls from all over the city .
#Text=I think Mako 's starting a panic .
#Text=" Mako says : " What 's confusing ?
#Text=I 'm giving very specific instructions .
#Text=" Lin says : " Great , this is just what we need .
#Text=" Wu says : " I got this .
#Text=Hello , everyone , this is Prince Wu .
#Text=Now , I know you 're all a little scared .
#Text=Believe me , I know what it 's like to be afraid .
#Text=I used to not be able to go to the bathroom by myself .
#Text=But if we let that fear control us none of us will ever be able to go to the bathroom and then we all lose .
#Text=But the people of Republic City are n't losers , we 're winners .
#Text=Winners that are going to get out of this city in a calm and orderly fashion .
#Text=So I want you to grab your family , grab your neighbor grab that guy down the street you do n't know very well and head to the nearest bus , train or ferry station .
#Text=We 're going to get you out of here , safe and sound .
#Text="
